articles.author: Jon Fingas
articles.title: Apple service outages affect App Store, Maps and more
articles.description: Notice Apple that several Apple services are unavailable? You're not alone. As Bloomberg's Mark Gurman notes, Apple's system status page indicates outages across several major services, including the App Store, Apple Arcade, Apple TV+, on-device AppleCare, Fi…

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Foxconn’s Shenzhen factories resume operations after lockdown
articles.description: Foxconn, the world’s biggest contract manufacturer of electronics, says it’s “basically” resumed normal operations in Shenzhen after a partial lockdown forced its factories offline. Its Longhua and Guanlan factories are impacted.
articles.content:
After a week offline
Photo by Nora Tam/South China Morning Post via Getty Images

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Today I learned an iPhone trick to quickly select multiple items
articles.description: There’s a built in gesture to bulk select messages, emails, notes, and more across Apple’s stock apps. Rather than using a sub-menu menu to put the items in “Select” mode, you can just swipe two fingers down the list.
articles.content:
The iPhone 13 Mini and iPhone 13. | Photo by Vjeran Pavic / The Verge

 

 I almost feel silly writing this out but… did anyone else know there’s a built-in gesture to bulk select messages, emails, … [+1638 chars]
